sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Input, Menu, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from '../routes'; export default class MenuExampleBasic extends Component { state = {} handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }) render() { const { activeItem } = this.state return ( NebusisÂ® CAPAChain Listado de Quejas Registrar Queja Sobre nosotros ) } }
